name: .WVL File Extension
summary: Learn about .WVL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A WVL file is a bitmap image saved in an early version of the Corel Wavelet format. It contains a drawing or photo exported from CorelDRAW, Photo-Paint, or Photo House. WVL files were replaced by .WI files.

content: WVL images are compressed using wavelet compression. They can range in size from 16 to 2,048 pixels, and they can be grayscale or color images.

instructions: You can open a WVL file with CorelDRAW and Corel Photo-Paint, which are included in the CorelDRAW Graphics Suite (Windows).
CorelDRAW can convert WVL files to many more common image formats, including:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
